duties_responsibilities.duty: Acquire new revenue growth by generating outbound calls within existing services areas to new B2B prospects for permanent commercial and industrial customers.
Effectively respond to inbound calls to close a high percentage of business and drive price and term.
Develop and maintain a thorough knowledge of the company’s available services, lines of business, pricing structures, and offers additional services as appropriate to existing customers.
Utilize prospecting and retention customer database while scheduling and documenting all activities.
Responsible for achieving and/or exceeding monthly growth quota.
Performs other job-related duties as assigned.
